info.name: Firefox Hybrid skin (CTR for Photon)
info.description:
The new photon style has had mixed reactions, unfortunately Mozilla decided to end XUL-extensions so we don't have CTR anymore.
This skin aims to enable the most important classic theme features in the new photon era of Firefox.

IMPORTANT!
- Click on Advanced Style Settings Button to customize your theme
-Copy the code into the userChrome file.
info.additionalInfo:
Initial release:
- Curved Tabs
- Navigation buttons inspired from Australis theme
- Old menu
- Old urlbar
- Some tweaks to the theme according to my taste
- Check Advanced Style Settings for more

settings.label: Reload button in adressbar(if yes put reload button to the right of adressbar)
Hide tab list button(you don't need it)
